ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:0}); // {Aeris}
“The gate to Sector 7's in there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“Thanks.
I guess this is goodbye.
You gonna be all right
going home?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Aeris}
“I could do that.
But won't I be
in your way?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cloud}
“What do you
mean in the way?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Aeris}
“Isn't that a little out of the way?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Aeris}
“Can we take a break?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Aeris}
“I can't believe it's still here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Aeris}
“That girl in the cart was {Tifa}?
Where was she going?
She looked kind of odd…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“I'll go on alone!
You go home!”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“Thanks.
I guess this is goodbye.
You gonna be all right
going home?”

{Aeris}
“Oh no!
'What ever will I do!?'
…Isn't that
what you want me
to say?”
{CHOICE}Take her home.
{CHOICE}Go on to Sector 7.

{Aeris}
“Isn't that a little out of the way?”

{Aeris}
“I could do that.
But won't I be
in your way?”

{Cloud}
“What do you
mean in the way?”

{Aeris}
“No. But I liked
him for a while.”

{Cloud}
“I probably knew him.
What was his name?”

{Aeris}
“Okay, I guess I'll be going home now.
I'm glad I met you, {Cloud}.”

{Aeris}
“That girl in the cart was {Tifa}?
Where was she going?
She looked kind of odd…”

{Cloud}
“I'll go on alone!
You go home!”
